title: PetSmart 's revenue in the U.S. 2014/15 - 2019/20
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 6 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2019/20 to 2017/18.
Additionally, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2016/17 to 2014/15.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2017/18 to 2016/17.
gold: PetSmart , formerly known as PetFood Warehouse , is an American retail chain which focuses on the sale of pet products as well as services , such as grooming and training . PetSmart was the leading pet retailer in the United States in 2019 in terms of market share . Their revenue reached approximately 6.49 billion U.S. dollars in the United States in the 2018/19 fiscal year ending on January 31 .
